html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13112022-12-07,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, III and VI – Helicopters and Rotorcraft)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, III AND VI – HELICOPTERS AND ROTORCRAFT) in order to (1) clarify ambiguities and repeal redundant requirements; (2) align the English and French versions of the provisions; (3) amend exceptions to flight operation rules and airspace restriction; and (4) codify a temporary exemption relating to certain equipment requirements for offshore transportation during an emergency.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0267 Publication Date: 2022-12-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Parts I, III and VI – Helicopters and Rotorcraft)
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PARTS I, III AND VI – HELICOPTERS AND ROTORCRAFT) in order to (1) clarify ambiguities and repeal redundant requirements; (2) align the English and French versions of the provisions; (3) amend exceptions to flight operation rules and airspace restriction; and (4) codify a temporary exemption relating to certain equipment requirements for offshore transportation during an emergency.
